actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-365.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 272 - 113 (Record Vote No: 361).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4700) to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to authorize the President to control oil supplies and prices in the event of a severe petroleum supply interruption, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4700 (Presidential control of oil supplies).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4700) to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to authorize the President to control oil supplies and prices in the event of a severe petroleum supply interruption, and for other purposes.
